Systems that needs ansible - Install ansible

Ansible 9

  1. Enable ansible9 local repository
    cat << EOF | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.repos.d/local.repo

[local-driv-ansible9]
name=local-driv-ansible9
baseurl=http://${server}/sources/ansible9/rhel-7-server-ansible-2.9-rpms/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0
proxy=_none_
EOF
  2. Install
    sudo yum -y install ansible
